did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Records of the Arizona Corporation Commission, 1912-1913
did.abstract: The Arizona Corporation Commission was a state commission to regulate corporations. The collection includes miscellaneous opinions and orders pertaining to applications presented to the Arizona Corporation Commission.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Records of the Arizona Corporation Commission (AZ 168). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Miscellaneous opinions and orders pertaining to applications presented to the Arizona Corporation Commission.
